_description: James Ryman, a hymn to the Trinity — eight quatrains (abab) including refrain, ‘O deus sine termino’ and burden: ‘O o o o o o o o / O deus sine termino’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O fader withoute begynnyngO sonne and holigoost
                    also…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…That deyed for vs one good FridayEt regnat sine
                        termino
